Variable Documentation

W dxul description

Initial value:

 function(node){var props = node.getAttributeNames();
    this.tagName = 'description';
    
    this.init(node);

    this.body.innerHTML = node.children[0].content;
    
    for(var i in props){
        var prop = node.getAttribute(props[i]);
        switch(props[i]){
            case 'value':
                this.body.innerHTML = prop;
                break;
        }
    }
}
